strategy.title: Requirements
steps: Both are Hallow's End holiday items

strategy.title: How to Obtain
steps: Kill the Headless Horseman daily in Scarlet Monastery (queue via Dungeon Finder)
Both items can drop from his loot bag
Also available from Tricky Treat bags (trick or treat at innkeepers)
Can take multiple years if unlucky - keep trying daily

strategy.title: Tips
steps: Run on all your alts daily for more chances
Headless Horseman is available at level 10+
Event runs late October each year
The mount (Horseman's Reins) is separate and very rare
